objects.description: [PlugX](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0013) has a module to download and execute files on the compromised machine.(Citation: CIRCL PlugX March 2013)(Citation: DOJ Affidavit Search and Seizure PlugX December 2024)(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)(Citation: Proofpoint TA416 Europe March 2022)
